Verses: 1 dhaaveedhukku Epronile Pirandha Kumaarar: Yesreyel Ooraalaana Aginovaamidaththil Pirandha Amnon Mudharperaanavan; Karmelin Ooraalaana Abigaayelidaththil Pirandha Dhaaniyel Irandaam Kumaaran.
2 kesoorin Raajaavaagiya Thalmaayin Kumaaraththi Maakkaal Petra Apsalom Moondraam Kumaaran; Aageedh Petra Adhoniyaa Naalaam Kumaaran.
3 abiththaal Petra Seppaththiyaa Aindhaam Kumaaran; Avan Penjaadhiyaagiya Eklaal Petra Idhreyaam Aaraam Kumaaran.
4 indha Aaru Kumaarar Avanukku Epronile Pirandhaargal; Ange Ezhuvarushamum Aarumaadhamum Arasaandaan; Erusalemilo Muppaththumoondru Varusham Arasaandaan.
5 erusalemil Avanukkup Pirandhavargal: Ammiyelin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Padhsuvaalidaththil Simeeyaa, Sobaab, Naaththaan, Saalomon Ennum Naaluperum,
6 ipkaar, Elisaamaa, Elippeledh,
7 nogaa, Nebek, Yappiyaa,
8 elisaamaa, Eliyaadhaa, Elibeledh Ennum Onbadhuperume.
9 marumanaiyaattigalin Kumaararaiyum Ivargal Sagodhariyaagiya Thaamaaraiyum Thavira, Ivargalellaarum Dhaaveedhin Kumaarar.
10 saalomonin Kumaaran Regobeyaam; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Abiyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Aasaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yosabaadh.
11 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yoraam; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Agasiyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yovaas.
12 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Amadhsiyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Asariyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yodhaam.
13 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Aagaas; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Esekkiyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Manaase.
14 ivanudaiya Kumaaran Aamon; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Yosiyaa.
15 yosiyaavin Kumaarar, Mudhal Pirandha Yoganaanum, Yoyaakkeem Ennum Irandaam Kumaaranum, Sidhekkiyaa Ennum Moondraam Kumaaranum, Salloom Ennum Naalaam Kumaaranume.
16 yoyaakkeemin Kumaarar, Ekoniyaa Mudhalaanavargal; Ivanukku Maganaanavan Sidhekkiyaa.
17 kattunda Ekoniyaavin Kumaarar Salaaththiyel,
18 malkeeraam, Pedhaayaa, Senaasaar, Yegamiyaa, Osaamaa, Nedhabiyaa Enbavargal.
19 pedhaayaavin Kumaarar, Serubaabel, Simeyi Enbavargal; Serubaabelin Kumaarar, Mesullaam, Ananiyaa Enbavargal; Ivargal Sagodhari Selomeedh Enbaval.
20 asoobaa, Ogel, Peragiyaa, Asadhiyaa, Oosaabesedh Ennum Aindhuperume.
21 ananiyaavin Kumaarar, Peleththiyaa, Esaayaa Enbavargal; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Rebaayaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Arnaan; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Obadhiyaa; Ivanudaiya Kumaaran Sekkaniyaa.
22 sekkaniyaavin Kumaarar, Semaayaa Mudhalaanavargal; Semaayaavin Kumaarar, Aththoos, Ekeyaal, Paariyaa, Neyaariyaa, Seppaadh Ennum Aaruper.
23 neyaariyaavin Kumaarar, Eliyoi, Esekkiyaa, Asrikkaam Ennum Moondruper.
24 eliyonaayin Kumaarar, Odhaayaa, Eliyaasip, Pelaayaa, Akkoop, Yoganaan, Thelaayaa, Aanaani Ennum Ezhuper.
